str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From asthenes; feebleness; by implication, malady; morally, frailty.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An island. Probably from the base of naus; an island.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From the same as therapon; to wait upon menially, i.e. to adore, or to relieve.
